snippet.title: Arma 2: Reinforcements - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
REINFORCEMENTS HAVE ARRIVED!

An official launch trailer unleashed in support of the recently deployed standalone expansion, Arma 2: Reinforcements.

Arma 2: Reinforcements unites two independent factions -- British Armed Forces and Private Military Company -- on one DVD. Play it separately across the single-player and co-op campaigns, or join friends in multiplayer battles with up to 50 players and hundreds of AI units. 

Uncover the dramatic events of post-invasion Takistan - originally described in Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead - through the eyes of British Paratrooper, Brian Frost, as he fights against the dangerous insurgency for both his country and his company.  Deploy a mechanized division of British Armed Forces sent to reinforce Coalition troops battling the large-scale outbreak of Guerilla insurgency, and join the Private Military Company, contracted to protect a UN weapons inspection team in Takistan.

As a special bonus, each retail version of Arma 2: Reinforcements in Europe includes a unique printed, large map showing Takistan on the front with Shapur & The Proving Grounds terrains on the reverse. Plan your military operations in style!
